duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership for a team of Quality Engineers and manage all management responsibilities such as goals, objectives, reviews, coaching, mentoring, and career development.
Work closely with the Quality Director to create and enforce compliance of standard QA processes, tools, metrics, and governance criteria for assigned products.
Using continuous improvement techniques, lead the teams towards zero production defects and manage to a set of pre-defined KPIs that will be used to effectively measure QA success.
Proactively manage deviations from the KPIs and develop action plans to close them.
Work proactively with internal stakeholders such as Product Management, Professional Services, Customer Support, and others to help define and implement improvements in the Quality Assurance program.

Ensure compliance to a rigorous set of acceptance criteria exists for release of code to client-facing environments and actively participate in the ITIL processes of Change Management, Problem Management & Release Management to identify ways to improve quality.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, STEM-related or Business-Related degree (Master's preferred)
